title: Author & Reviewer Resources
description: Everything you need to prepare and review manuscripts for ACS journals. Log in to view the status of your submitted work, manuscripts you are reviewing, and performance of published articles.
cleaned_text: Select an ACS journal to access its author guidelines, which includes information on the following topics (and more): - Journal Scope - Manuscript Types - Manuscript Preparation Instructions - Editorial Policies - Data and Figure Requirements - Open Access and Preprint Policies - Contact Information Or, learn about
